recommendations: Add explicit linkage from XLSX uploads to downstream revenue booking: only 1.2% of BKRVNU rows match an upload by user +48h window. Even relaxed matching is only 28.5%. Capture the upload batch/filename and propagate it into revenue booking metadata.
validation_steps: Apply change to jessupload.
Re-run the harness on the same dataset scope.
Confirm BP_OT_WTS_HOURS and busy periods improve vs baseline.

recommendations: Reduce close-cycle slowdown for jbprepay: median 541.0s vs 127.0s (Δ 414.0s, 4.26x; p=0.001996). Reschedule or add dedicated capacity during close cycle.
validation_steps: Apply change to jbprepay.
Re-run the harness on the same dataset scope.
Confirm BP_OT_WTS_HOURS and busy periods improve vs baseline.
